posts.post_content:
dummies. asking them to make Duel Decks: Knights vs. Dragons without including one of either Black Knight or White Knight is like asking them to make   
Duel Decks: Jace vs. Chandra without Counterspell and Incinerate (complete with Jaya Ballard quote, DAMN YOU M12!!!), or   
Duel Decks: Angels vs. Demons without Akroma, Angel of Wrath and Lord of the Pit. or   
Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition without Coaltion Relic, or   
Duel Decks: Tezzeret vs. Elspeth without Crusade and Thirst for Knowledge.  
  
Or Premium Deck Series: Fire & Lightning without 4x Lightning Bolt  
  
I would not have been surprised to see White Knight as a four-of. and EVEN though they decided on mono-red for the Dragon deck, when Red-Black could have been more interesting and made this card better, White Knight is STILL one of the best cards in the Knight deck.
